action.action-desc: Mr. Long introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide greater State flexibility and innovation through Medicaid cost-sharing waivers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicaid Cost-Sharing Waiver Flexibility Act of 2017.

section.header: Greater State flexibility and innovation through Medicaid cost-sharing waivers
section.text: Section 1916(f) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396o(f)) is amended, in the matter before paragraph (1), by inserting after imposed the following: with respect to individuals who qualify for medical assistance on the basis of being 65 years of age or older, blind, or disabled.
